tests package¶

Submodules¶

tests.test_biosim_interface module¶

Test set for BioSim class interface for INF200 January 2019.

This set of tests checks the interface of the BioSim class to be provided by the simulation module of the biosim package.

Notes:
  • The BioSim class should pass all tests in this set.
  • The tests check only that the class interface can be used, not that the class functions correctly. You need to write your own tests for that.
  • You should only run these tests on your code after you have implemented both animal and all landscape classes.
